means: 努力奋斗，力求( strive的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We are now striving hard to establish a transparent parliamentary democracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们现在正努力建立明晰的议会民主制。

sentence.Network_en: The swimmer was striving against the current.
sentence.Network_cn: 游泳者正在和激浪搏斗.

sentence.Network_en: Borrowers are striving to ease their financial position by spending less and saving more.
sentence.Network_cn: 借债人正努力减少支出、增加储蓄，以缓解财务紧张的窘况。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The thriving races are striving for a derivation of their deprived rights ., 发展中的种族们正奋斗着 , 以期能获得对他们失去权利性的来源.
the germans were always striving for beauty ., 德国人还总是为美女而努力.
The management and all employees of SNC are striving for this goal., SNC 管理层人员和所有员工为此目标而奋斗.
personal freedoms are worth striving after ., 人身自由是值得为之而奋斗的.

list.abs: ...(order)、责任心(dutifulness)、追求成就(achievement striving)、自律(self－discipline)、深思熟虑(delib－eration)；在该维度得分高.
四级真题词汇 - 豆丁网 ... strike up 开始（谈话�相识等） strive for 为…而奋斗 submit to 把…提交给….
四级真题词汇 - 豆丁网 ... strike up 开始（谈话�相识等） strive for 为…而奋斗 submit to 把…提交给….
life is not a game and I do strive to continually grow in emotional spiritual and mental maturity .生命不是一场游戏，而我也努力地在自己的情绪中、感情中、成熟的心理中得到不断的成长。

entry.def: If you strive to do something or strive for something, you make a great effort to do it or get it.

example.ex: He strives hard to keep himself very fit...
example.tran: 他努力地保持身体健康。

example.ex: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar...
example.tran: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

means.word_mean: 1. an effortful attempt to attain a goal

auth_sentence.content: But I believe striving forward is part of human nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I believe striving forward is part of human nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I believe striving forward is part of human nature.

auth_sentence.content: They are only striving to supply a demand.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are only striving to supply a demand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are only striving to supply a demand.

auth_sentence.content: I have achieved what I have long been striving for.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have achieved what I have long been striving for.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have achieved what I have long been striving for.
